name: Core
description: Avalanche Core Wallet is a secure, user-friendly wallet for AVAX and other Avalanche tokens. It offers easy asset management, staking, and dApp integration, making it suitable for all users.

missions.name: Avalanche core Missions
missions.description: Core is a platform for creating and sharing interactive experiences, especially games. It offers a user-friendly interface for developers of all skill levels, promoting community collaboration and innovation.

quests.name: Validation Vanguard
quests.description: Be a validator on any project

tasks.name: Validation Vanguard
tasks.description: Be a validator on any project
